feed.title: Julia Portmannâ€™s Research
feed.subtitle: My research focuses broadly on freshwater ecology and the impacts of changing landscapes using field and remote sensing techniques. I am interested in both lentic and lotic systems, with a particular focus on aquatic invertebrates.
